name: Len R's Well Rounded search and text boxes REDUX
description:
please support me if you enjoy this; thank you to everyone who has already!
v3.0b4

also, as a little extra, wide search results on google (full width; generally shows quotes on one line)
some of the minor unfinished edges in the sshot have been fixed
Matches my ff3 theme: http://userstyles.org/styles/6292
A remake of the version at http://userstyles.org/styles/6294 - cleaner, more dialog types

google, amazon, yahoo, ebay, pubmed, userstyles, userscripts, wikipedia, piratebay, mozilla addons, amf, yahoo fantasy, youtube... and many more
